Schaumburg.Schaumburg station: Schaumburg is a station on Metra's Milwaukee District/West in Schaumburg, Illinois. The station is 26.5 miles (42.6 km) away from Union Station, the eastern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Schaumburg is in zone F. The station is adjacent to Boomers Stadium, home of the Schaumburg Boomers of the Frontier League.
